name: kafka
description: Apache Kafka running on top of Apache Mesos
preInstallNotes: This will install Apache Kafka DC/OS Service.
postInstallNotes:
The Apache Kafka DC/OS Service is installed:
  docs   - https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/kafka/n  issues - https://github.com/mesos/kafka/issues
postUninstallNotes:
The Apache Kafka DC/OS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
Please follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/kafka/uninstall/ to clean up any persisted state
